text: そのためのパイロットとテクノロジーです / まさか科学と人の心があの化け物を抑えるとでも本気ですか / ええもちろんですよ
translation: That's what the pilot and technology are for. / You can't seriously believe that science and the human heart can control that monster? / Yes, of course I do.

vocabulary.meaning: to control, to restrain, to suppress

grammar: とでも - expresses doubt/incredulity about a statement; 本気ですか - rhetorical question expressing disbelief

text: 人の心などという曖昧なものに頼っているから / ネルフは先のような暴走を許すんですよ
translation: Because you rely on something as vague as the human heart, / NERV allows incidents like the previous runaway to happen.

vocabulary.meaning: to rely on, to depend on

grammar: などという - dismissive expression 'such a thing as'; から - reason marker; んですよ - explanatory tone with emphasis

text: その結果国連は莫大な追加予算を迫られ / 某国では2万人を超える合社を出そうとしているんです
translation: As a result, the UN was forced to provide a massive supplementary budget, / and a certain country is about to report over 20,000 casualties.

vocabulary.meaning: to be pressed, to be forced

grammar: 迫られる - passive form indicating being forced; 超える - 'to exceed'; んです - explanatory tone

text: その上あれほど重要な事件に関わらず / 未だにその原因が不明とは
translation: On top of that, despite it being such an important incident, / the cause is still unknown.
grammar: に関わらず - 'despite, regardless of'; とは - expresses surprise or criticism at the end of a sentence

text: せめて責任者としての責務は全うしてほしいもんですな / よかったですね / ネルフが超法規的に保護されていて
translation: At the very least, I'd like you to fulfill your duties as the person responsible. / How nice for you / that NERV is protected by extra-legal measures.

vocabulary.meaning: at least, at the very least

grammar: としての - 'as a ~'; てほしいもんですな - requesting with polite yet critical tone; されていて - te-form connecting clauses

text: あなた方はその責任も取らずに済みますから / なんとおっしゃられようと / ネルフの主力兵器以外 / あの敵生体は倒せません / ATフィールドですか?
translation: Because you can get away without taking responsibility. / No matter what you say, / without NERV's main weapons, / those enemy organisms cannot be defeated. / The AT Field?

vocabulary.meaning: to get away without doing, to avoid having to do

grammar: ずに済む - 'to avoid having to, to get away without'; おっしゃられようと - honorific + volitional + と meaning 'no matter what you say'

text: それも今では時間の問題に過ぎません / いつまでもネルフの時代ではありませんよ
translation: Even that is now just a matter of time. / It won't be NERV's era forever.
grammar: に過ぎない - 'nothing more than, merely'; いつまでも～ではありません - negative form emphasizing impermanence

text: フラッチャン / クソッ / あのゾグブスどもが
translation: Damn it! / Shit! / Those bastards.
grammar: ども - plural suffix that can be neutral or derogatory depending on context; here used derogatorily

text: どうせうちの利権にあぶれた連中の腹いせでしょ / 腹立つわね / こら
translation: They're probably just venting their frustration at missing out on our interests. / It's infuriating. / Hey!

vocabulary.meaning: to miss out, to be left out

grammar: にあぶれた - 'missed out on'; でしょ - casual form of でしょう expressing assumption

text: およしなさいよほとなげない
translation: Stop it, be mature about it.
grammar: およしなさい - polite command form 'please stop'; 大人げない - na-adjective meaning 'immature, childish'

text: お疲れ様でした
translation: Good work, thank you for your efforts.

vocabulary.meaning: thank you for your hard work

grammar: お疲れ様でした - standard polite phrase expressing appreciation for effort/work completed

text: バランス正常 動力異常なし 了解
translation: Balance normal. Power normal. Acknowledged.
grammar: Technical status reporting language; なし - 'without, none'

text: 引き続き左足前へ / 両方揃う
translation: Continue with left foot forward. / Both aligned.

vocabulary.meaning: to be aligned, to be complete

grammar: へ - direction marker; 揃う - intransitive verb meaning 'to be aligned'

text: へえ ちゃんと歩いてる 自慢するだけのことはあるよね
translation: Wow, it's actually walking. I guess they have reason to be proud of it.
grammar: だけのことはある - 'to be worth it, to have reason to'; よね - seeking confirmation/agreement

text: どうした / 変です リアクターの内圧が上昇していきます / 一時冷却水の温度も上昇し
translation: What's wrong? / Something's strange. The reactor's internal pressure is rising. / The primary coolant temperature is also rising.

vocabulary.reading: いちじれいきゃくすい

grammar: していきます - progressive action continuing into the future; も - 'also, too'

text: バルブ開放 原則材を注入 / ダメです!本部の出力が上がりません!
translation: Open the valve! Inject control material! / It's no good! The main output isn't rising!
grammar: を注入 - object marker with action verb; 上がりません - negative polite form indicating failure

text: いかん!動力閉鎖、緊急停止 / 停止信号、発信を確認
translation: This is bad! Shut down power, emergency stop! / Stop signal transmission confirmed.
grammar: いかん - masculine/formal exclamation; を確認 - confirming/verifying something

text: 受信されず、無散回路も普通です! / 制御不能! / そんな馬鹿な… / うわああああ / ああああああああああああああああああああああああ
translation: Not receiving! The backup circuit is normal too! / Out of control! / That's impossible... / Ahhhhhh / Ahhhhhhhhhh!
grammar: されず - negative form of passive; そんな馬鹿な - expressing disbelief 'that's absurd/impossible'

text: 作った人に似て礼儀知らずなロボットね
translation: Just like its creator, an ill-mannered robot.

vocabulary.meaning: to resemble, to be similar to

grammar: に似て - 'resembling, like'; 知らず - suffix meaning 'lacking, without knowledge of'

text: からつきに異常発生!制御を作動しません!
translation: Abnormality in the mechanical unit! Controls are not responding!
grammar: を作動しません - negative form indicating 'not operating/functioning'

text: このままでは路線誘拐の危険もあります / 信じられん
translation: At this rate, there's also danger of core meltdown. / Unbelievable.
grammar: では - conditional marker; もあります - 'there is also'; られん - contracted negative potential form

text: JAにはあらゆるミスを想定し、すべてに対処すべくプログラムは組まれているのに、この世の事態はありえないはずだ。 / だけど今、現に炉心誘拐の危機が迫っているのよ。
translation: JA is programmed to anticipate every mistake and deal with everything, so this situation shouldn't be possible. / But right now, the danger of core meltdown is actually approaching.
grammar: すべく - 'in order to'; はずだ - expressing expectation; 現に - 'actually, in reality'; のに - 'although, despite'

text: こうなっては自然に停止するのを待つしか方法は…。 / 自動停止の確率は? / 0.00002%。まさに奇跡です。
translation: At this point, our only option is to wait for it to stop naturally... / What's the probability of automatic shutdown? / 0.00002%. It would truly be a miracle.

vocabulary.meaning: at this point, now that it's come to this

grammar: こうなっては - 'now that it's come to this'; しか～ない - 'only, nothing but'; まさに - emphasis adverb

text: 奇跡を待つより捨て身の努力よ。停止手段を教えなさい。 / 方法はすべて試した。
translation: Better a desperate effort than waiting for a miracle. Tell me how to stop it. / We've tried every method.
grammar: より - comparative 'rather than'; 教えなさい - command form 'tell me'; すべて - 'all, everything'

text: いいえ、まだ全てを白紙に戻す最後の手段が残っているはずよ / そのパスワードを教えなさい / 全プログラムのデリートは最高機密
translation: No, there should still be one last means to reset everything to zero. / Tell me that password. / Deleting all programs is top secret.
grammar: に戻す - 'to return to'; はずよ - expectation with feminine emphasis; 全プログラムの - genitive particle linking 'all programs' with deletion

text: 私の管轄外だ、公害の権限はない / だったら命令をもらいなさい、今すぐ
translation: It's outside my jurisdiction. I don't have that authority. / Then get authorization. Right now.
grammar: はない - negative form of existence; だったら - conditional 'if that's the case'; もらいなさい - command form 'receive/get'

text: 私だ、第二東京のマンダさんを頼む / そう、内務省長官だ
translation: It's me. Please connect me to Manda in Second Tokyo. / Yes, the Minister of the Interior.
grammar: を頼む - 'to request/ask for'; だ - assertive copula

text: ああ、その件はヤスギ君に任せである / 彼に聞いてくれ
translation: Ah, I've left that matter to Yasugi. / Ask him.
grammar: に任せである - 'have entrusted to'; てくれ - casual request form

text: そういう重要な決定事項は口頭ではね / 正式に書簡で回してもらえる
translation: Such important decisions can't be made orally. / Please send it formally in writing.
grammar: ではね - implies incompleteness/inadequacy; で回してもらえる - causative-passive requesting 'please have it sent'
